title: Password Validator
description: Check if a password meets rules (length, symbols, etc).
requirements: Ask the user to input a password.
Ensure the password has at least 8 characters.
Ensure it includes both letters and digits.
Check for special characters like !, @, #, etc.
Print whether the password is strong or weak.
hints: Use any(char in '!@#$%' for char in pwd)
